import React from 'react' import products from '../data/products' import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import { Container, Button, Row, Col, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' const Productscreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <>

{product.name}
) } export default Productscreen
